menu.cd:
With a combined experience of nearly 10 years Taylored Beauty aspire to be on trend.

 Katie has worked in most areas within the beauty industry but primarily as a self employed Nail Technician and is renowned locally for her fabulous Bio Sculpture nail creations. Laura specialises in Amazing Eyelash Extensions and has become known for creating the most desired & long lasting lashes in the area. With a successful career in banking Laura has now created such a large client base the beauty has now taken over!

Both busy working mums with the ability to juggle home life and a passion for 'Tayloring' beauty treatments we aim to offer a relaxed and fashionable service, that no-one else in Alton can provide.

Message from the Taylor's

We will "Taylor" any beauty need that you have, and if a treatment you want is not initially on our list PLEASE ASK! We will endeavour to help you. Likewise if you are beauty professional offering a treatment that you would like "Taylored" then please get in touch with us as we would be happy to have you in the salon!

Katie and Laura Taylor Owners
menu.cd1:
Spray Tanning Using SiennaX and Fake Bake. Long lasting award winning natural looking tans, to suit all skin tones.

Bio Sculpture Nails Beautiful Soak off UV Gels lasting 3 weeks before needing infilling. Hottest new colours in stock.

Gelish Amazing 14 day Gel Polish.

EZ Flow Hard file off gel nails, great for weak and extended nails.

HD Brows The celebrity must have of 2012. The 7 step process to fabulous brows. - www.hdbrows.co.uk

Amazing Lash Extensions Achieve different looks from natural pretty, to full on glamour with waterproof eyelash extensions. These look great for a holiday or wedding and are lightweight so perfect for everyday.

Waxing Using the innovative new wax from Australia, Waxxpress.

LVL Lash Volume Length. The perfect way to accentuate your natural lashes.

Emani Mineral Make-Up Beautiful soft natural mineral make up by Emani.
menu.cd2:
Tanning Preparation

Shave/wax at least 24 hours before tanning. Exfoliate, shower and moisturise the night before tanning â€“ do not moisturise on the day of the tan. Remove all face make-up prior to tanning. Wear dark underwear & loose dark clothing. Bring flip flops or loose shoes for after the tanning. Paint nails with clear or coloured nail polish.

Not suitable for people with respiratory problems or within the first 3 months of Pregnancy. Any Medical conditions must be disclosed to the therapist, prior to tanning as consent from your G.P. may be required.

Eyelash and Eyebrow Preparation

Patch tests required for Eyelash and Eyebrow Tinting, LVL, and eyelash extensions if extremely sensitive eyes.
